oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Drilling equipment eye-level view, circa 1950
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pennsylvania Drilling Company
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black-and-white photograph credited to Penndrill Manufacturing Division depicting employees operating drilling equipment. A handwritten note below the image reads, "THIS ONE," with an arrow marking the middle panel.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Iron industry and trade; Drilling and boring machinery
Pennsylvania Drilling Company
